snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk broke a tie with a short-handed goal Thursday, helping the Devils beat the slumping Tampa Bay Lightning, 4-2, for their third straight win.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils beat Tampa Bay Lightning, 4-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk broke a tie with a short-handed goal Thursday, helping the Devils beat the slumping Tampa Bay Lightning, 4-2, for their third straight win.

headline.seo: Devils and Penguins Extend Streaks; Sabres Rally to Win
headline.main: Devils and Penguins Extend Streaks; Sabres Rally to Win
headline.print_headline: Devils and Penguins Extend Streaks; Sabres Rally to Win
